name: dw_colors
summary: Set of black color schemes with some highlight variations
description:
Like the summary says.  Screenshots for all variants can be found here: http://sites.google.com/site/dwcolors/

A contact e-mail is in the header of the colorschemes.  Please feel free to contact me with comments.
install_details:
Unzip the package in your color schemes directory.

Use ":colors dw_green" or similar to switch between different variants or save in your vimrc.
